DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether subject treat BOTOX : 1. decrease frequency intensity migraine headaches 2. experience improvement quality life 3. experience reduction frequency health care service obtain .

Subject receive primary health care Park Nicollet Health Services . Subject receive previous injection botulinum toxin serotype reason , within 6 month prior study participation .
